    • sendBoard

      public void sendBoard​(java.lang.Object[][] serializedBoard, java.util.List<ImmutablePosition> allowedPositions)
      Brief Sends the serialized board to each client together with a list of positions, then waits for a receiving confirmation from every client
      Parameters:
      serializedBoard - is a serialized board containing all the relevant information
      allowedPositions - are the positions where the current playing player can move or place his worker or build a block

    • getVote

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getVote​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> playersNames, java.lang.String question)
      Brief Sends a poll to each player whom id are contained in a map passed as a parameter
      Parameters:
      playersNames - is a map between the ids of the players who are asked to answer the poll and their names
      question - is the poll's question
      Returns:
      the list of players' ids voted by each player

      Brief Sends to a player his result in the match, then disconnects him from the server or kick him if the game isn't over yet
      Parameters:
      playerId - is the id of the receiving player
      message - is the message containing the result of the match
      gameOver - is true if game is over

    • manageChoice

      protected GameMessage manageChoice​(GameMessage message, java.lang.Integer playerId)
      Brief Handles a general choice by sending a message to a certain player, telling the other ones to wait their turn and waiting for the player's answer
      Parameters:
      message - is the message to send to the player
      playerId - is the id of the receiving player
      Returns:
      a message containing the player's answer
